description: List of all stations, their capacities and locations. REQUIRED of systems utilizing docks.

last_updated.description: Last time the data in the feed was updated in POSIX time.

ttl.description: Number of seconds before the data in the feed will be updated again (0 if the data should always be refreshed).

version.description: GBFS version number to which the feed conforms, according to the versioning framework (added in v1.1).

data.description: Array that contains one object per station as defined below.

short_name.description: Short name or other type of identifier.

cross_street.description: Cross street or landmark where the station is located.

region_id.description: Identifier of the region where the station is located.

post_code.description: Postal code where station is located.

rental_methods.description: Payment methods accepted at this station.

capacity.description: Number of total docking points installed at this station, both available and unavailable.

rental_uris.description: Contains rental uris for Android, iOS, and web in the android, ios, and web fields (added in v1.1).

android.description: URI that can be passed to an Android app with an intent (added in v1.1).

ios.description: URI that can be used on iOS to launch the rental app for this station (added in v1.1).

web.description: URL that can be used by a web browser to show more information about renting a vehicle at this station (added in v1.1).
